rules_text:
[i]General of the Sable Order – [/i]At the beginning of your upkeep, manifest the top card of your library. Face-down creatures you control are Knights in addition to their other types.
[i]Most Able Warrior Alive[/i] – At the beginning of each end step, untap Camus, the Sable.
[i]Gradivus[/i] – {W}{B}: Regenerate Camus. [i](The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)[/i]
